name: UIAccessibilityNavigationStyle
desc: Constants that describe how to navigate an object’s elements with an assistive app.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The assistive technology automatically determines how the receiver's elements should be navigated.

items.name: case separate
items.desc: The receiver's elements should be navigated as separate elements.

items.name: case combined
items.desc: The receiver’s elements should be combined and navigated as a single item.
